e: ￹`Pina~ `a~ `so'ot~ `ko~ `aalaen~?￺How many hundred should we take?￻我們要拿幾百個？
￹`Semo'ot~ `aca~ `ko~ `aalaen~ `ita~.￺We should take just one hundred.￻我們只要拿一百個
d.f: ￹￺a bundle of one hundred￻捆一百個

e: ￹`So'oten~ `ko~ `fokes~.￺Tie your hair back.￻把頭髮綁成馬尾
￹`Kinaso'ot~ `cingra~ `a~ `kinapatay~.￺He killed himself by hanging.￻他上吊自殺
￹`So'~ `oten~ `ko~ `ma~`ri'ang~`ay~ `a~ `tamdaw~.￺Tie up / imprison in cords the criminal.￻把壞人關起來，把罪犯逮捕法辦
